net.proteusframework.core.locale.annotation

Annotation Type L10N


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=SOURCE)
@Target(value={})
public @interface L10N
    Defines a localization record for an I18N.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String value
      The localization value.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String locale
      Get the locale.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        The localization value.
        Returns:
        the value.

      • locale

        public abstract String locale
        Get the locale. Defaults to "en".
        Returns:
        the locale should be RFC 3066 format, e.g. "en-US". In the future, we may support other parts of the standard.
        Default:
        "en"
